title: Romantic Getaway in the McLaren Vale Wine Region
description: Leave the city behind and head for the stunning McLaren Vale, one of Australia’s most renowned wine regions located 40 minutes south of Adelaide, for a romantic getaway at Manor Estate. Discover this beautiful part of South Australia and enjoy a daily breakfast hamper, romantic flowers and chocolates on arrival, a guaranteed late checkout, an AU$100 wine voucher and more, including an AU$100 voucher to use towards the hire of the estate’s stylish BMW Z4 to travel around the region like a VIP.
offer_address: 40 Saddlebags Rd Kangarilla, McLaren Vale SA 5171

title: Romantic Getaway near the McLaren Vale Wine Region
description: Leave the city behind and head for the stunning McLaren Vale, one of Australia’s renowned wine regions, located 40 minutes south of Adelaide, for a romantic getaway at Manor Estate. Discover this beautiful part of South Australia and enjoy daily breakfast hampers, flowers and decadent chocolates on arrival, a guaranteed late checkout, a $100 wine voucher, and a discount when you hire the estate’s stylish BMW Z4 to travel around the region like a VIP.

title: Romantic Getaway near the McLaren Vale Wine Region
description: Leave the city behind and head to the stunning McLaren Vale, one of Australia’s renowned wine regions - located 40 minutes south of Adelaide - for a romantic getaway at Manor Estate. Discover this beautiful part of South Australia and enjoy daily continental breakfast hampers, flowers and decadent chocolates on arrival, a guaranteed 11am late checkout, a AU$100 wine voucher, a AU$50 voucher towards a wine tour of McLaren Vale and a discount when you hire the estate’s stylish BMW Z4 - to travel around the region like a VIP.
offer_address: 40 Saddlebags Rd Kangarilla, McLaren Vale SA 5171
